Home.paragraph: My name is Sharon Kadenyi. I'm a 4th year student at RorQuest College and with your permission, I'll make a university application for you to any university or college you choose in Canada.
Why: I have made many successful applications for my friends and family over the years.
I have experience in how to word the applications.
Why2: I will answer any question about my experiences as a student and work-study balance.
I'll offer advice on what courses to choose from based on your result slip.(minimum requirement is a C Plain in KCSE)

Features.title: Free Consultation
Features.text: I will glady answer any question about canada, the application or the courses. My whats app contact is at the bottom

Features.title: The Application
Features.text: I will make the university application for you based on the conversation we had during consultation and the information filled in the form after login.

Features.title: Payments
Features.text: I will only charge 4,850/= for making the application for you, everything else including consultation is FREE.

Features.title: Open and Transparent
Features.text: I will be open with every step of the application and give my honest opinion to all your questions.
